fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Single market
eu_initiatives: CAP, sugar market, bilateral and WTO trade negotiations, competition policy, industrial policy
organisation_name: Committee of the European Sugar Users (CIUS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
CIUS represents the European sugar-using food and beverage industries. CIUS members purchase and use almost 70% of the European annual consumption of sugar through its incorporation in a wide variety of added-value products and provide direct employment for over 350,000 people.  
 
  
CIUS has a substantial experience and an acute knowledge of the sugar market. CIUS shares its skills and understanding with all stakeholders and decision-makers interested in sugar in order to contribute to the building of impartial and prospective politics, for the development of  a transparent, competitive and fair sugar market.
